mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_address (name, phone, code, address, userId) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_address set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where addressId = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select addressId, name, phone, code, address, userId from t_address
